title: # 392 - Jo Koy & ME
description:
My brand new stand up comedy special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

Today I sit down with Jo Koy to talk about taping our specials, what it was like for Jo to transition to arenas, our promo video competitions, and much more!   

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast   

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, and sexual wellness for men. Try hims today by starting out with a FREE online visit. Go to www.forhims.com/bertcastED 

This episode is also brought to you by Cigar.com. Get 15% off on any order of $99 or more plus free shipping. Go to www.cigar.com and use the promo code "BERTCAST" at checkout. 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer  

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer  

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
